meaning_en: A process or set of rules to be followed in calculations or other problem-solving operations, especially by a computer.
meaning_th: ขั้นตอนวิธี, อัลกอริทึม
example:
The search engine's algorithm is constantly being updated.
The app uses a complex algorithm to suggest movies.
The programmer wrote a new sorting algorithm.

meaning_en: The theory and development of computer systems able to perform tasks that normally require human intelligence.
meaning_th: ปัญญาประดิษฐ์
example:
Artificial intelligence is transforming many industries.
The company is a leader in artificial intelligence research.
I am learning about artificial intelligence in school.

meaning_en: The use of largely automatic equipment in a system of manufacturing or other production process.
meaning_th: ระบบอัตโนมัติ
example:
The factory introduced automation to increase efficiency.
Automation can lead to job losses in some sectors.
The use of automation is growing rapidly.

meaning_en: The exploitation of biological processes for industrial and other purposes, especially the genetic manipulation of microorganisms for the production of antibiotics, hormones, etc.
meaning_th: เทคโนโลยีชีวภาพ
example:
Biotechnology is used to develop new medicines.
The company specializes in agricultural biotechnology.
Biotechnology has great potential for solving global problems.

meaning_en: A program with a graphical user interface for displaying HTML files, used to navigate the World Wide Web.
meaning_th: เบราว์เซอร์
example:
My browser is running very slowly.
I need to open a new tab in my browser.
The web page looks different on each browser.

meaning_en: A unit of digital information, usually consisting of eight bits.
meaning_th: ไบต์
example:
The file size is 10 megabytes.
A kilobyte is 1,024 bytes.
The program takes up a lot of bytes on my hard drive.

meaning_en: The practice of using a network of remote servers hosted on the internet to store, manage, and process data.
meaning_th: คลาวด์คอมพิวติ้ง
example:
Many businesses now use cloud computing services.
Cloud computing allows for flexible data storage.
He is an expert in cloud computing security.

meaning_en: A system of words, letters, figures, or symbols used to represent others.
meaning_th: รหัส, โค้ด
example:
The programmer wrote the code for the new app.
The error is in the last line of the code.
I'm learning to write code in Python.

meaning_en: The state of being protected against the criminal or unauthorized use of electronic data.
meaning_th: ความปลอดภัยทางไซเบอร์
example:
The company is investing in cybersecurity to protect its data.
Cybersecurity is a major concern for governments.
She works in the field of cybersecurity.

meaning_en: Facts and statistics collected together for reference or analysis.
meaning_th: ข้อมูล
example:
The scientist is analyzing the data from the experiment.
The company collects a lot of customer data.
We need to back up our data regularly.

meaning_en: Relating to, or using, computers and the internet.
meaning_th: ดิจิทัล
example:
The world is becoming increasingly digital.
He prefers to read digital books over printed ones.
We are in the midst of a digital revolution.

meaning_en: Commercial transactions conducted electronically on the internet.
meaning_th: อีคอมเมิร์ซ
example:
E-commerce has changed the way we shop.
The company's e-commerce platform is very successful.
He started an e-commerce business last year.

meaning_en: A small mechanical or electronic device or tool.
meaning_th: แกดเจ็ต, อุปกรณ์
example:
He loves buying the latest electronic gadgets.
This kitchen gadget makes cooking much easier.
The spy used a high-tech gadget to open the door.

meaning_en: The physical components of a computer system.
meaning_th: ฮาร์ดแวร์
example:
I need to upgrade my computer's hardware.
The new software requires better hardware.
The hardware and software must work together perfectly.

meaning_en: The action or process of inventing or creating something new.
meaning_th: นวัตกรรม
example:
The company is a leader in technological innovation.
Innovation is key to economic growth.
The new product is a result of great innovation.

meaning_en: A global computer network providing a variety of information and communication facilities.
meaning_th: อินเทอร์เน็ต
example:
I use the internet for research and communication.
The internet has revolutionized the way we live.
The internet connection is very slow today.

meaning_en: A group or system of interconnected people or things.
meaning_th: เครือข่าย
example:
The company's computer network is very secure.
He is a part of a large professional network.
The new policy will affect the entire network.

meaning_en: A system that supports the operation of a particular application or set of applications.
meaning_th: แพลตฟอร์ม
example:
The new app is available on multiple platforms.
The company is building a new social media platform.
The software is compatible with both platforms.

meaning_en: The branch of technology that deals with the design, construction, operation, and application of robots.
meaning_th: วิทยาการหุ่นยนต์
example:
Robotics is a rapidly advancing field.
He is studying robotics at university.
The factory uses robotics for manufacturing.

meaning_en: The programs and other operating information used by a computer.
meaning_th: ซอฟต์แวร์
example:
The new software is very easy to use.
I need to install the latest software update.
The company develops custom software for clients.

meaning_en: Communication over a distance by cable, telegraph, telephone, or broadcasting.
meaning_th: โทรคมนาคม
example:
The project aims to improve telecommunication services in rural areas.
Telecommunication is a crucial part of our modern society.
He works in the telecommunication industry.

meaning_en: A semiconductor device used to amplify or switch electronic signals and electrical power.
meaning_th: ทรานซิสเตอร์
example:
The computer chip contains billions of tiny transistors.
The invention of the transistor revolutionized electronics.
The device is built with a new type of transistor.

meaning_en: A simulated experience that can be similar to or completely different from the real world.
meaning_th: ความเป็นจริงเสมือน
example:
Virtual reality is often used for gaming and training.
She tried virtual reality for the first time.
The company is developing a new virtual reality headset.

meaning_en: Electronic technologies that are worn by users.
meaning_th: เทคโนโลยีสวมใส่
example:
Smartwatches are a popular form of wearable technology.
Wearable technology is used to monitor health and fitness.
The market for wearable technology is growing.

meaning_en: Using radio, microwaves, etc., to transmit signals, without wires.
meaning_th: ไร้สาย
example:
I have a wireless mouse and keyboard.
The new camera has a wireless connection.
We are using a wireless network to connect to the internet.

meaning_en: A program or piece of software designed and written to fulfill a particular purpose.
meaning_th: แอปพลิเคชัน
example:
I downloaded a new application on my phone.
There's an application for almost everything now.
The application crashed and I lost my work.

meaning_en: A system in which a record of transactions made in bitcoin or another cryptocurrency are maintained across several computers that are linked in a peer-to-peer network.
meaning_th: บล็อกเชน
example:
Blockchain technology is known for its security and transparency.
The company is exploring the use of blockchain for supply chain management.
He is a blockchain developer.

meaning_en: The art of writing or solving codes.
meaning_th: การเข้ารหัสลับ
example:
Cryptography is essential for securing digital communications.
He is an expert in the field of cryptography.
The course covers the basics of modern cryptography.

meaning_en: A structured set of data held in a computer, especially one that is accessible in various ways.
meaning_th: ฐานข้อมูล
example:
The company stores all customer information in a large database.
The website is connected to a central database.
I need to search the database for the client's name.

meaning_en: To copy data from one computer system to another, typically over the Internet.
meaning_th: ดาวน์โหลด
example:
I need to download the file from the website.
You can download the app for free.
He downloaded a new song onto his phone.

meaning_en: The process of converting information or data into a code, especially to prevent unauthorized access.
meaning_th: การเข้ารหัส
example:
The files are protected by strong encryption.
The company uses encryption to secure its emails.
Encryption is a vital part of cybersecurity.

meaning_en: The use of thin flexible fibers of glass or plastic to transmit light signals.
meaning_th: ใยแก้วนำแสง
example:
Fiber optics provides much faster internet speeds.
The city is installing a new fiber optics network.
The company is a leader in fiber optics technology.

meaning_en: A part of a computer system or network that is designed to block unauthorized access while permitting outward communication.
meaning_th: ไฟร์วอลล์
example:
The company's firewall protects its network from cyberattacks.
You should have a firewall on your personal computer.
The firewall blocked the suspicious activity.

meaning_en: A person who uses computers to gain unauthorized access to data.
meaning_th: แฮกเกอร์
example:
The company hired an ethical hacker to test their security.
The hacker stole sensitive information from the company.
He was a famous computer hacker in the 1990s.

meaning_en: A device or program enabling a user to communicate with a computer.
meaning_th: ส่วนต่อประสาน, อินเทอร์เฟซ
example:
The software has a very user-friendly interface.
The new interface is much more intuitive.
I prefer the old interface of the program.

meaning_en: A very small piece of a semiconductor, typically silicon, on which a number of components are integrated.
meaning_th: ไมโครชิป
example:
The microchip is the brain of the computer.
The new device contains a powerful microchip.
There is a global shortage of microchips.

meaning_en: A device that converts digital signals from a computer into analog signals that can be transmitted over a telephone line.
meaning_th: โมเด็ม
example:
I need to restart my modem to fix the internet connection.
The modem is connected to the router.
My modem is blinking red.

meaning_en: The branch of technology that deals with dimensions and tolerances of less than 100 nanometers.
meaning_th: นาโนเทคโนโลยี
example:
Nanotechnology has applications in medicine and engineering.
He is a researcher in the field of nanotechnology.
The product uses nanotechnology to create a durable surface.

meaning_en: A set of instructions written in a computer language to perform a specific task.
meaning_th: โปรแกรม
example:
I wrote a simple program to calculate the average.
The new program is very efficient.
The computer is running several programs at once.

meaning_en: A request for information from a database.
meaning_th: คำสั่งเรียกข้อมูล, คำถาม
example:
The search engine processes millions of queries every second.
I ran a query to find all the records from last month.
The system responds to user queries instantly.

meaning_en: A device that forwards data packets between computer networks.
meaning_th: เราเตอร์
example:
My router is not working, so I can't connect to the internet.
You need to connect to the router to get Wi-Fi.
I bought a new wireless router for my home.

meaning_en: A computer or computer program that manages access to a centralized resource or service in a network.
meaning_th: เซิร์ฟเวอร์
example:
The website is hosted on a powerful server.
The server is down, so I can't access my files.
The company has hundreds of servers.

meaning_en: A mobile phone that performs many of the functions of a computer.
meaning_th: สมาร์ทโฟน
example:
I use my smartphone for emails, photos, and social media.
The new smartphone has a very powerful camera.
Almost everyone has a smartphone now.

meaning_en: Websites and applications that enable users to create and share content or to participate in social networking.
meaning_th: โซเชียลมีเดีย
example:
Social media has a huge impact on our lives.
He spends too much time on social media.
The company uses social media for marketing.

meaning_en: A particularly powerful mainframe computer.
meaning_th: ซูเปอร์คอมพิวเตอร์
example:
The weather forecast is run on a supercomputer.
The government has invested in a new supercomputer.
Supercomputers are used for complex scientific calculations.

meaning_en: To work from home, making use of the internet, email, and the telephone.
meaning_th: ทำงานทางไกล
example:
More people are choosing to telecommute to work.
I telecommute from my home office.
Telecommuting can save time and money.

meaning_en: To copy data from one computer system to another, typically to a larger central one via the Internet.
meaning_th: อัปโหลด
example:
I need to upload the photos to the cloud.
You can upload your video to the website.
He uploaded the document to the server.

meaning_en: The means by which the user and a computer system interact.
meaning_th: ส่วนต่อประสานกับผู้ใช้
example:
The user interface of the new program is very intuitive.
A good user interface is crucial for a successful app.
They hired a designer to improve the user interface.

meaning_en: Not physically existing as such but made by computer software to appear to do so.
meaning_th: เสมือนจริง
example:
The company held a virtual meeting instead of a physical one.
The game creates a virtual world for players.
He lives in the virtual space of the internet.

meaning_en: A seminar conducted over the Internet.
meaning_th: การสัมมนาผ่านเว็บ
example:
The company held a webinar to launch the new product.
I attended a very interesting webinar on marketing.
The webinar will be hosted by our CEO.

meaning_en: A facility allowing computers, smartphones, or other devices to connect to the internet or communicate with one another wirelessly within a particular area.
meaning_th: ไวไฟ
example:
I can't connect to the Wi-Fi.
Is there free Wi-Fi in this café?
The Wi-Fi signal is very weak here.

meaning_en: The range of frequencies within a given band, in particular that used for transmitting a signal.
meaning_th: แบนด์วิธ
example:
Our internet has a high bandwidth.
The video game requires a lot of bandwidth to run smoothly.
The server has limited bandwidth.

meaning_en: The smallest unit of data in a computer.
meaning_th: บิต
example:
A byte is composed of eight bits.
The signal is transmitted in a stream of bits.
The computer processes bits very quickly.

meaning_en: A temporary storage space used by a computer's processor to access data more quickly.
meaning_th: แคช
example:
I need to clear my browser's cache to solve the problem.
The computer stores frequently used data in the cache.
The cache speeds up the application's performance.

meaning_en: A piece of computer hardware or software that accesses a service made available by a server.
meaning_th: ไคลเอนต์
example:
The client sends a request to the server.
The software runs on the client computer.
He works on the client-side of the application.

meaning_en: A device or program that compresses data to enable faster transmission and decompresses it at the receiving end.
meaning_th: โคเดก
example:
The video file requires a specific codec to play.
The codec improves the quality of the video.
The software package comes with a new codec.

meaning_en: A small piece of data sent from a website and stored on the user's computer by the user's web browser while the user is browsing.
meaning_th: คุกกี้
example:
The website uses cookies to remember your preferences.
You should clear your browser cookies regularly.
Accepting cookies is a choice you have to make on most sites.

meaning_en: The process of identifying and removing errors from computer hardware or software.
meaning_th: การแก้ไขข้อผิดพลาด
example:
Debugging the program took several hours.
He is an expert in debugging complex code.
Debugging is a crucial part of software development.

meaning_en: A part of a computer system or network that is designed to block unauthorized access while permitting outward communication.
meaning_th: ไฟร์วอลล์
example:
The company's firewall protects its network from cyberattacks.
You should have a firewall on your personal computer.
The firewall blocked the suspicious activity.

meaning_en: A unit of information equal to one billion bytes.
meaning_th: กิกะไบต์
example:
My laptop has a 500-gigabyte hard drive.
The file size is 2 gigabytes.
The new phone comes with 128 gigabytes of storage.

meaning_en: A unit of computing speed equal to one billion floating-point operations per second.
meaning_th: กิกะฟลอป
example:
The supercomputer is capable of thousands of gigaflops.
Gigaflops are used to measure the performance of a computer.
The new processor has a high gigaflop count.

meaning_en: A link from a hypertext document to another location, activated by clicking on a highlighted word or image.
meaning_th: ไฮเปอร์ลิงก์
example:
The article contains several hyperlinks to other websites.
Click on the hyperlink to open the new page.
I added a hyperlink to the document.

meaning_en: A language for describing web pages.
meaning_th: เอชทีเอ็มแอล
example:
I am learning to code in HTML.
The website's structure is built with HTML.
HTML is a fundamental language for web development.

meaning_en: The interconnection via the Internet of computing devices embedded in everyday objects.
meaning_th: อินเทอร์เน็ตในทุกสิ่ง
example:
The smart home system is a perfect example of IoT.
The growth of the IoT market is very fast.
IoT devices are used to collect data and automate tasks.

meaning_en: A unique address that identifies a device on the internet or a local network.
meaning_th: ที่อยู่ไอพี
example:
Your computer's IP address is used to identify your location.
The hacker was traced by their IP address.
You can find your IP address in the network settings.

meaning_en: An object-oriented computer programming language commonly used to create interactive effects within web browsers.
meaning_th: จาวาสคริปต์
example:
I am learning JavaScript for web development.
The website's interactive features are built with JavaScript.
JavaScript is a very popular programming language.

meaning_en: A unit of memory or data storage, equal to 1,024 bytes.
meaning_th: กิโลไบต์
example:
The file size is only a few kilobytes.
A kilobyte is a thousand bytes.
The document is 20 kilobytes in size.

meaning_en: A unit of information equal to one million bytes.
meaning_th: เมกะไบต์
example:
The image file is 5 megabytes.
A megabyte is 1,024 kilobytes.
My internet plan gives me 100 megabytes of data.

meaning_en: An integrated circuit that contains all the functions of a central processing unit of a computer.
meaning_th: ไมโครโพรเซสเซอร์
example:
The microprocessor is the heart of the computer.
The new microprocessor is faster and more efficient.
The company is a leading manufacturer of microprocessors.

meaning_en: A device that converts digital signals from a computer into analog signals that can be transmitted over a telephone line.
meaning_th: โมเด็ม
example:
I need to restart my modem to fix the internet connection.
The modem is connected to the router.
My modem is blinking red.

meaning_en: (of software) denoting software for which the original source code is made freely available and may be modified.
meaning_th: โอเพนซอร์ส
example:
Linux is a well-known example of open source software.
The company released its new technology as open source.
Open source projects rely on community collaboration.

meaning_en: A minute area of illumination on a display screen, one of many from which an image is composed.
meaning_th: พิกเซล
example:
The image is 1080 pixels wide.
The new screen has a very high pixel density.
You can see the individual pixels if you look closely.

meaning_en: A component in a computer system that executes instructions.
meaning_th: หน่วยประมวลผลกลาง
example:
The new laptop has a very fast processor.
The processor is the main part of the computer.
A faster processor can improve your computer's performance.

meaning_en: The action or process of writing computer programs.
meaning_th: การเขียนโปรแกรม
example:
He is studying programming at a technical college.
Programming requires a lot of logical thinking.
I'm learning a new programming language.

meaning_en: A set of rules governing the exchange or transmission of data.
meaning_th: ระเบียบพิธี
example:
The computer network uses a specific protocol to communicate.
The new security protocol will be implemented next week.
The data transfer follows a standard protocol.

meaning_en: A program that searches for and identifies items in a database that correspond to keywords or characters specified by the user.
meaning_th: เครื่องมือค้นหา
example:
Google is the most popular search engine in the world.
I used a search engine to find the information.
The company is working on a new search engine.

meaning_en: A device that detects or measures a physical property and records, indicates, or otherwise responds to it.
meaning_th: เซ็นเซอร์
example:
The car has sensors to detect obstacles.
The device uses a sensor to measure temperature.
The phone's sensor adjusts the screen brightness automatically.

meaning_en: A unit of information equal to one trillion bytes.
meaning_th: เทราไบต์
example:
My external hard drive has a capacity of 2 terabytes.
The company's data storage is measured in terabytes.
A terabyte is 1,024 gigabytes.

meaning_en: The address of a World Wide Web page.
meaning_th: ยูอาร์แอล
example:
I need the URL of the website.
You can find the URL in the address bar.
The URL is very long and difficult to remember.

meaning_en: A process or set of rules to be followed in calculations or other problem-solving operations, especially by a computer.
meaning_th: ขั้นตอนวิธี, อัลกอริทึม
example:
The search engine's algorithm is constantly being updated.
The app uses a complex algorithm to suggest movies.
The programmer wrote a new sorting algorithm.

meaning_th: ปัญญาประดิษฐ์

meaning_en: A simulated experience that can be similar to or completely different from the real world.
meaning_th: ความเป็นจริงเสมือน
example:
Virtual reality is often used for gaming and training.
She tried virtual reality for the first time.
The company is developing a new virtual reality headset.

meaning_en: Electronic technologies that are worn by users.
meaning_th: เทคโนโลยีสวมใส่
example:
Smartwatches are a popular form of wearable technology.
Wearable technology is used to monitor health and fitness.
The market for wearable technology is growing.

meaning_en: Using radio, microwaves, etc., to transmit signals, without wires.
meaning_th: ไร้สาย
example:
I have a wireless mouse and keyboard.
The new camera has a wireless connection.
We are using a wireless network to connect to the internet.

meaning_en: A program or piece of software designed and written to fulfill a particular purpose.
meaning_th: แอปพลิเคชัน
example:
I downloaded a new application on my phone.
There's an application for almost everything now.
The application crashed and I lost my work.

meaning_en: A system in which a record of transactions made in bitcoin or another cryptocurrency are maintained across several computers that are linked in a peer-to-peer network.
meaning_th: บล็อกเชน
example:
Blockchain technology is known for its security and transparency.
The company is exploring the use of blockchain for supply chain management.
He is a blockchain developer.

meaning_en: The art of writing or solving codes.
meaning_th: การเข้ารหัสลับ
example:
Cryptography is essential for securing digital communications.
He is an expert in the field of cryptography.
The course covers the basics of modern cryptography.

meaning_en: A structured set of data held in a computer, especially one that is accessible in various ways.
meaning_th: ฐานข้อมูล
example:
The company stores all customer information in a large database.
The website is connected to a central database.
I need to search the database for the client's name.

meaning_en: To copy data from one computer system to another, typically over the Internet.
meaning_th: ดาวน์โหลด
example:
I need to download the file from the website.
You can download the app for free.
He downloaded a new song onto his phone.

meaning_en: The process of converting information or data into a code, especially to prevent unauthorized access.
meaning_th: การเข้ารหัส
example:
The files are protected by strong encryption.
The company uses encryption to secure its emails.
Encryption is a vital part of cybersecurity.

meaning_en: The use of thin flexible fibers of glass or plastic to transmit light signals.
meaning_th: ใยแก้วนำแสง
example:
Fiber optics provides much faster internet speeds.
The city is installing a new fiber optics network.
The company is a leader in fiber optics technology.

meaning_en: A part of a computer system or network that is designed to block unauthorized access while permitting outward communication.
meaning_th: ไฟร์วอลล์
example:
The company's firewall protects its network from cyberattacks.
You should have a firewall on your personal computer.
The firewall blocked the suspicious activity.

meaning_en: A person who uses computers to gain unauthorized access to data.
meaning_th: แฮกเกอร์
example:
The company hired an ethical hacker to test their security.
The hacker stole sensitive information from the company.
He was a famous computer hacker in the 1990s.

meaning_en: A device or program enabling a user to communicate with a computer.
meaning_th: ส่วนต่อประสาน, อินเทอร์เฟซ
example:
The software has a very user-friendly interface.
The new interface is much more intuitive.
I prefer the old interface of the program.

meaning_en: A very small piece of a semiconductor, typically silicon, on which a number of components are integrated.
meaning_th: ไมโครชิป
example:
The microchip is the brain of the computer.
The new device contains a powerful microchip.
There is a global shortage of microchips.

meaning_en: A device that converts digital signals from a computer into analog signals that can be transmitted over a telephone line.
meaning_th: โมเด็ม
example:
I need to restart my modem to fix the internet connection.
The modem is connected to the router.
My modem is blinking red.

meaning_en: The branch of technology that deals with dimensions and tolerances of less than 100 nanometers.
meaning_th: นาโนเทคโนโลยี
example:
Nanotechnology has applications in medicine and engineering.
He is a researcher in the field of nanotechnology.
The product uses nanotechnology to create a durable surface.

meaning_en: A set of instructions written in a computer language to perform a specific task.
meaning_th: โปรแกรม
example:
I wrote a simple program to calculate the average.
The new program is very efficient.
The computer is running several programs at once.

meaning_en: A request for information from a database.
meaning_th: คำสั่งเรียกข้อมูล, คำถาม
example:
The search engine processes millions of queries every second.
I ran a query to find all the records from last month.
The system responds to user queries instantly.

meaning_en: A device that forwards data packets between computer networks.
meaning_th: เราเตอร์
example:
My router is not working, so I can't connect to the internet.
You need to connect to the router to get Wi-Fi.
I bought a new wireless router for my home.

meaning_en: A computer or computer program that manages access to a centralized resource or service in a network.
meaning_th: เซิร์ฟเวอร์
example:
The website is hosted on a powerful server.
The server is down, so I can't access my files.
The company has hundreds of servers.

meaning_en: A mobile phone that performs many of the functions of a computer.
meaning_th: สมาร์ทโฟน
example:
I use my smartphone for emails, photos, and social media.
The new smartphone has a very powerful camera.
Almost everyone has a smartphone now.

meaning_en: Websites and applications that enable users to create and share content or to participate in social networking.
meaning_th: โซเชียลมีเดีย
example:
Social media has a huge impact on our lives.
He spends too much time on social media.
The company uses social media for marketing.

meaning_en: A particularly powerful mainframe computer.
meaning_th: ซูเปอร์คอมพิวเตอร์
example:
The weather forecast is run on a supercomputer.
The government has invested in a new supercomputer.
Supercomputers are used for complex scientific calculations.

meaning_en: To work from home, making use of the internet, email, and the telephone.
meaning_th: ทำงานทางไกล
example:
More people are choosing to telecommute to work.
I telecommute from my home office.
Telecommuting can save time and money.

meaning_en: To copy data from one computer system to another, typically to a larger central one via the Internet.
meaning_th: อัปโหลด
example:
I need to upload the photos to the cloud.
You can upload your video to the website.
He uploaded the document to the server.

meaning_en: The means by which the user and a computer system interact.
meaning_th: ส่วนต่อประสานกับผู้ใช้
example:
The user interface of the new program is very intuitive.
A good user interface is crucial for a successful app.
They hired a designer to improve the user interface.

meaning_en: Not physically existing as such but made by computer software to appear to do so.
meaning_th: เสมือนจริง
example:
The company held a virtual meeting instead of a physical one.
The game creates a virtual world for players.
He lives in the virtual space of the internet.

meaning_en: A seminar conducted over the Internet.
meaning_th: การสัมมนาผ่านเว็บ
example:
The company held a webinar to launch the new product.
I attended a very interesting webinar on marketing.
The webinar will be hosted by our CEO.

meaning_en: A facility allowing computers, smartphones, or other devices to connect to the internet or communicate with one another wirelessly within a particular area.
meaning_th: ไวไฟ
example:
I can't connect to the Wi-Fi.
Is there free Wi-Fi in this café?
The Wi-Fi signal is very weak here.

meaning_en: The range of frequencies within a given band, in particular that used for transmitting a signal.
meaning_th: แบนด์วิธ
example:
Our internet has a high bandwidth.
The video game requires a lot of bandwidth to run smoothly.
The server has limited bandwidth.

meaning_en: The smallest unit of data in a computer.
meaning_th: บิต
example:
A byte is composed of eight bits.
The signal is transmitted in a stream of bits.
The computer processes bits very quickly.

meaning_en: A temporary storage space used by a computer's processor to access data more quickly.
meaning_th: แคช
example:
I need to clear my browser's cache to solve the problem.
The computer stores frequently used data in the cache.
The cache speeds up the application's performance.

meaning_en: A piece of computer hardware or software that accesses a service made available by a server.
meaning_th: ไคลเอนต์
example:
The client sends a request to the server.
The software runs on the client computer.
He works on the client-side of the application.

meaning_en: A device or program that compresses data to enable faster transmission and decompresses it at the receiving end.
meaning_th: โคเดก
example:
The video file requires a specific codec to play.
The codec improves the quality of the video.
The software package comes with a new codec.

meaning_en: A small piece of data sent from a website and stored on the user's computer by the user's web browser while the user is browsing.
meaning_th: คุกกี้
example:
The website uses cookies to remember your preferences.
You should clear your browser cookies regularly.
Accepting cookies is a choice you have to make on most sites.

meaning_en: The process of identifying and removing errors from computer hardware or software.
meaning_th: การแก้ไขข้อผิดพลาด
example:
Debugging the program took several hours.
He is an expert in debugging complex code.
Debugging is a crucial part of software development.

meaning_en: A part of a computer system or network that is designed to block unauthorized access while permitting outward communication.
meaning_th: ไฟร์วอลล์
example:
The company's firewall protects its network from cyberattacks.
You should have a firewall on your personal computer.
The firewall blocked the suspicious activity.

meaning_en: A unit of information equal to one billion bytes.
meaning_th: กิกะไบต์
example:
My laptop has a 500-gigabyte hard drive.
The file size is 2 gigabytes.
The new phone comes with 128 gigabytes of storage.

meaning_en: A unit of computing speed equal to one billion floating-point operations per second.
meaning_th: กิกะฟลอป
example:
The supercomputer is capable of thousands of gigaflops.
Gigaflops are used to measure the performance of a computer.
The new processor has a high gigaflop count.

meaning_en: A link from a hypertext document to another location, activated by clicking on a highlighted word or image.
meaning_th: ไฮเปอร์ลิงก์
example:
The article contains several hyperlinks to other websites.
Click on the hyperlink to open the new page.
I added a hyperlink to the document.

meaning_en: A language for describing web pages.
meaning_th: เอชทีเอ็มแอล
example:
I am learning to code in HTML.
The website's structure is built with HTML.
HTML is a fundamental language for web development.

meaning_en: The interconnection via the Internet of computing devices embedded in everyday objects.
meaning_th: อินเทอร์เน็ตในทุกสิ่ง
example:
The smart home system is a perfect example of IoT.
The growth of the IoT market is very fast.
IoT devices are used to collect data and automate tasks.

meaning_en: A unique address that identifies a device on the internet or a local network.
meaning_th: ที่อยู่ไอพี
example:
Your computer's IP address is used to identify your location.
The hacker was traced by their IP address.
You can find your IP address in the network settings.

meaning_en: An object-oriented computer programming language commonly used to create interactive effects within web browsers.
meaning_th: จาวาสคริปต์
example:
I am learning JavaScript for web development.
The website's interactive features are built with JavaScript.
JavaScript is a very popular programming language.

meaning_en: A unit of memory or data storage, equal to 1,024 bytes.
meaning_th: กิโลไบต์
example:
The file size is only a few kilobytes.
A kilobyte is a thousand bytes.
The document is 20 kilobytes in size.

meaning_en: A unit of information equal to one million bytes.
meaning_th: เมกะไบต์
example:
The image file is 5 megabytes.
A megabyte is 1,024 kilobytes.
My internet plan gives me 100 megabytes of data.

meaning_en: An integrated circuit that contains all the functions of a central processing unit of a computer.
meaning_th: ไมโครโพรเซสเซอร์
example:
The microprocessor is the heart of the computer.
The new microprocessor is faster and more efficient.
The company is a leading manufacturer of microprocessors.

meaning_en: A device that converts digital signals from a computer into analog signals that can be transmitted over a telephone line.
meaning_th: โมเด็ม
example:
I need to restart my modem to fix the internet connection.
The modem is connected to the router.
My modem is blinking red.

meaning_en: (of software) denoting software for which the original source code is made freely available and may be modified.
meaning_th: โอเพนซอร์ส
example:
Linux is a well-known example of open source software.
The company released its new technology as open source.
Open source projects rely on community collaboration.

meaning_en: A minute area of illumination on a display screen, one of many from which an image is composed.
meaning_th: พิกเซล
example:
The image is 1080 pixels wide.
The new screen has a very high pixel density.
You can see the individual pixels if you look closely.

meaning_en: A component in a computer system that executes instructions.
meaning_th: หน่วยประมวลผลกลาง
example:
The new laptop has a very fast processor.
The processor is the main part of the computer.
A faster processor can improve your computer's performance.

meaning_en: The action or process of writing computer programs.
meaning_th: การเขียนโปรแกรม
example:
He is studying programming at a technical college.
Programming requires a lot of logical thinking.
I'm learning a new programming language.

meaning_en: A set of rules governing the exchange or transmission of data.
meaning_th: ระเบียบพิธี
example:
The computer network uses a specific protocol to communicate.
The new security protocol will be implemented next week.
The data transfer follows a standard protocol.

meaning_en: A program that searches for and identifies items in a database that correspond to keywords or characters specified by the user.
meaning_th: เครื่องมือค้นหา
example:
Google is the most popular search engine in the world.
I used a search engine to find the information.
The company is working on a new search engine.

meaning_en: A device that detects or measures a physical property and records, indicates, or otherwise responds to it.
meaning_th: เซ็นเซอร์
example:
The car has sensors to detect obstacles.
The device uses a sensor to measure temperature.
The phone's sensor adjusts the screen brightness automatically.

meaning_en: A unit of information equal to one trillion bytes.
meaning_th: เทราไบต์
example:
My external hard drive has a capacity of 2 terabytes.
The company's data storage is measured in terabytes.
A terabyte is 1,024 gigabytes.

meaning_en: The address of a World Wide Web page.
meaning_th: ยูอาร์แอล
example:
I need the URL of the website.
You can find the URL in the address bar.
The URL is very long and difficult to remember.
